note.p: Birth: Poulton le Sands, Morecambe, Lancashire, England (14 June 1857)
Education: St John's College, Cambridge. MA, DSc, Hon PhD (1908, Prague)
Career: Fellow of St John's College, Cambridge; Woodwardian Professor of Geology, University of Cambridge (1917-1933)
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1932-1935 vol l pp 251-257, plate
